1.title: Enter the Dolt
1.plot: Ruby Rose confronts the villainous Roman Torchwick, gaining the attention of Professor Ozpin, the immature headmaster of the illustrious Beacon Academy.

2.title: Guns 'n' Roses
2.plot: Ruby Rose and Yang Xiao Long arrive at Beacon Academy, where they are confronted by Weiss Schnee, the eccentric heiress to the mob-controlled Schnee Dust Company, the world's largest supplier of Dust and illegal drugs.

3.title: Miss Valkyrie, Tear Down This Wall!
3.plot: As Yang Xiao Long tries to steer her sister away from her strange obsession with her weapon, nerdy freshman Jaune Arc attempts to curry favor with Weiss Schnee in the hopes that she will help jump-start his career in entertainment.

4.title: The Odd Couples
4.plot: Beacon Academy's newest recruits land in the Emerald Forest, where they face off against hordes of unforgiving Grimm...and each other.

5.title: Quoth the Raven...
5.plot: After a series of startling events reunites them at an abandoned temple, our heroes must work together to defeat a pair of colossal Grimm and escape the Emerald Forest.

6.title: Grimm-Hog Day
6.plot: Weiss Schnee suddenly finds herself living the same day over and over again.

7.title: The Bonds That Tie
7.plot: Jaune Arc suddenly finds himself on Cardin Winchester's leash after having a major argument with Pyrrha Nikos.

8.title: Role Reversal
8.plot: Cardin Winchester's plan to humiliate Pyrrha Nikos in front of the student body backfires when a massive Ursa attacks his team.

imdb.plot outline: Pure evil pervades the future-fantasy world of Remnant. Monstrous creatures roam the planet, ruthlessly attacking and destroying everything in their paths. An endless streak of robberies, murders, and terrorist attacks have plunged the sovereign kingdom of Vale into chaos. The kingdom's last line of defense against the dark forces lusting for the destruction of civilization itself? An innocent girl with a crush on her weapon, a drug-dealing heiress, a conspiracy theorist, and a clueless sorority girl. What could possibly go wrong?
imdb.title: RWBY: Abrg
plot: Team KRWBY's fan-based parody of "RWBY", an American animated series created by Monty Oum and Rooster Teeth Productions.::James Tangman

Pure evil pervades the future-fantasy world of Remnant. Monstrous creatures roam the planet, ruthlessly attacking and destroying everything in their paths. An endless streak of robberies, murders, and terrorist attacks have plunged the sovereign kingdom of Vale into chaos. The kingdom's last line of defense against the dark forces lusting for the destruction of civilization itself? An innocent girl with a crush on her weapon, a drug-dealing heiress, a conspiracy theorist, and a clueless sorority girl. What could possibly go wrong?::James Tangman
